author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
This is probably because of cabal mods Bardfinn and SkynetJusticeWarri0r constantly talking about us on AHS. They don't even care about the actual hate subs anymore, they just can't take any criticism. Bardfinn literally called both WRD and The_Cabal "white supremacist" subs. Them and Things_Make_Me_Sad are doing nothing but flooding AHS and TMoR with posts about WRD, T_C, and PoliticalCompassMemes. They saw their opportunity, and it has proven successful.

On a mostly unrelated note, and I bet another cabal mod allthefoxes/CorvusCalvaria is the one behind both me getting banned and the /r/yiffinhell takeover. While the latter has already been well-established, I have now heard mention of him telling the admins to also ban a few users he doesn't like. And he has a history of doing the same as a Discord employee. This would make sense, considering how he mentioned he "can't get people suspended *on the fly*, unfortunately", indicating that he has some sort of influence on the actions of reddit's admins.

title: WatchRedditDie, The_Cabal, DeclineIntoCensorship, et. al to be banned!
